archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.2.8b: b) technical security infrastructure (e.g. Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), Identity and Access Management (IAM), Data Leakage Prevention (DLP) and Digital Rights Management (DRM))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
